channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- NUC Kits
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- NUC Kits

item.title: CVE-2017-5701|2024-09-17T03:02:24.375Z -- intel%20corporation -- nuc%20kits
item.description: Insecure platform configuration in system firmware for Intel NUC7i3BNK, NUC7i3BNH, NUC7i5BNK, NUC7i5BNH, NUC7i7BNH versions BN0049 and below allows an attacker with physical presence to run arbitrary code via unauthorized firmware modification during BIOS Recovery.
